attributes.action: Grant an offshore broadcasting licence to Radio Caroline
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Radio Caroline has proved her sustainability and popularity. She retains a ship (the Ross Revenge), capable of being refitted for broadcasting.
The granting of an offshore broadcasting licence would recognise her popularity, and undo the injustice of a heavy handed government attitude in the 1960's.
This country urgently needs a "feel-good factor", and the granting of this licence would instantly provide one.
